title: 亲亲漫画
SecondReadModeXpath: function getQZImgList(){     var key = "vXDk7pQzc1sK32O0";     var iv = "9bVCION1sbL1wd4D";     var isgbk = "0";          var chapterImages = html.match(/chapterImages = "([^"]*)"/)[1];     var chapterPath = html.match(/chapterPath = "([^"]*)"/)[1];      var result = Jaes(chapterImages,key,iv,isgbk);      var list = JSON.parse(result);     var ch_list = [];      var host = "http://mhimg.9mmc.com:44237/";     for (var i=0; i<list.length; i++) {         if (list[i].search(/^https?:\/\/(images.dmzj.com|imgsmall.dmzj.com)/i)==0) {             ch_list[i] = host+"showImage.php?url="+list[i];         }         else if (list[i].search(/^[a-z]\//i)==0) {             ch_list[i] = host+"showImage.php?url=https://images.dmzj.com/"+list[i];         }         else if (list[i].search(/^(http:|https:|ftp:|^)\/\//i)==0) {         ch_list[i] = list[i];         }         else {         ch_list[i] = host+chapterPath+list[i];         }     }          return ch_list; }
